channel.title: Interface Help
channel.description:
[center]Hey Guys, i made it so an interface opens when u log in. Its just a Simple one, Heres a Screeny. [img]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss328/Crazyfaze/EP.jpg[/img]
Now what happens is when its there i cant move on the Playing Screen, But i can on the minimap and when i move it Dissapear's. I want it to Stay There, also when another interface opens.
Can u Guys help me plz :3[/center]
[center]The Code is: [code] CAM().sendMessage("Welcome back to "+Constants.SERVER_NAME+"."); CAM().showInterface(4535);[/code][/center]

item.title: Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @eld0002 eld0002
item.description:
@eld0002 wrote:

[center]Hey Guys, i made it so an interface opens when u log in.
Its just a Simple one, Heres a Screeny.

EP.jpg758×503

Now what happens is when its there i cant move on the Playing Screen, But i can on the minimap and when i move it Dissapear’s.
I want it to Stay There, also when another interface opens.

Can u Guys help me plz :3[/center]

[center]The Code is:

CAM().sendMessage("Welcome back to "+Constants.SERVER_NAME+"."); CAM().showInterface(4535);[/center]
